      Parameters:

    • timeValidityCheck

      public static boolean timeValidityCheck(LocalDateTime localStart, LocalDateTime localEnd)
      Checks whether input times are valid in EST (start before end, within business hours)
      Parameters:
      localStart - check start time
      localEnd - check end time
      Returns:
      false if invalid, true if valid

    • checkCustomerOverlap

      public static boolean checkCustomerOverlap(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> checkOverlapList, int customerID, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end) throws SQLException
      Checks whether a customer has a pre-existing appointment that would overlap with new appointment
      Parameters:
      checkOverlapList - list of appointments to iterate through
      customerID - customer to check
      start - check start time
      end - check end time
      Throws:
      SQLException
